name: Stift Klosterneuburg Grüner Veltliner Brut
description: Dry and refreshing sparkling Grüner Veltliner with crisp acidity. Notes of green apple, citrus, and a subtle peppery edge. Clean and lively, easy to drink, and great to start a meal.

name: Le Brun de Neuville Extra Blanc Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay
description: Classic Blanc de Blancs Champagne made entirely from Chardonnay. Bright citrus, green apple, and light brioche with fine bubbles and a focused, elegant finish.

name: Veuve Clicquot Yellow Label Brut
description: Well-balanced and familiar Champagne with notes of apple, pear, and toasted bread. Rich but still fresh, with a creamy texture and steady bubbles.

name: André Clouet Grande Réserve Brut NV
description: Fuller-bodied non-vintage Champagne with ripe fruit and a touch of richness. Apple, pear, and brioche flavors with a smooth, rounded finish.

name: Taittinger Brut La Française
description: Light, elegant Champagne with fine bubbles and bright acidity. Citrus, white flowers, and a hint of toast make this clean and refined without feeling heavy.

name: Perrier-Jouët Grand Brut
description: Fresh and floral in style with soft fruit and gentle toast. Pear, citrus, and a smooth finish make this approachable and easy to enjoy.

name: Moët & Chandon Impérial Brut
description: Classic house Champagne that’s balanced and consistent. Apple, citrus, and light bread notes with a creamy mouthfeel and lively bubbles.

name: Dom Pérignon Brut
description: Structured and layered vintage Champagne with depth and length. Citrus, stone fruit, and toasted notes come together in a refined, powerful style meant to be savored.

name: André Clouet Brut Rosé
description: Expressive rosé Champagne with fresh red berry flavors. Strawberry and raspberry notes balanced by bright acidity and a smooth, dry finish.

name: Marenco Pineto Brachetto d’Acqui
description: Lightly sparkling and gently sweet with lots of fresh strawberry and floral notes. Low alcohol and very drinkable, often enjoyed as a dessert or celebratory sip.

name: Jansz Premium Rosé Brut
description: Crisp Tasmanian sparkling rosé with red berry and citrus notes. Dry, refreshing, and clean, with fine bubbles and bright acidity.

name: Txomin Etxaniz Getari Hondarrabi Zuri
description: Fresh and lightly saline white from the Basque coast. Bright citrus, green apple, and a subtle spritz give this wine a crisp, refreshing feel that pairs well with seafood.

name: Domaine Roblin Enclos de Maimbray Sancerre
description: Clean and focused Sancerre with classic Sauvignon Blanc character. Notes of citrus, fresh herbs, and flinty minerality with a dry, precise finish.

name: Jean Claude Dagueneau Domaine des Berthiers Pouilly Fumé
description: Structured and mineral-driven Sauvignon Blanc. Smoke, citrus peel, and stone fruit come together with a firm, dry finish.

name: Château La Louvière Grand Vin de Graves Blanc
description: Classic white Bordeaux with balance and depth. Citrus, stone fruit, and subtle oak influence give this wine richness without heaviness.

name: Jean-Charles Les Champs L’Huillier Chardonnay
description: Traditional Burgundy Chardonnay with clean fruit and restrained oak. Apple, citrus, and a soft texture lead into a smooth, dry finish.

name: Marcel Servin Chablis Chardonnay
description: Crisp and mineral-driven Chablis. Green apple, lemon, and chalky notes with bright acidity and a clean finish.

name: Guy Robin Chablis Premier Cru Montmains Chardonnay
description: More layered and expressive Chablis from a Premier Cru site. Citrus, stone fruit, and mineral notes with added depth and length.

name: Samuel Billaud Chablis Chardonnay
description: Refined Chablis with precision and balance. Bright acidity, citrus, and subtle texture make this elegant and food-friendly.

name: Cinco Islas Albariño
description: Fresh and aromatic Albariño with lively acidity. Notes of citrus, peach, and a hint of salinity give this wine a crisp coastal character.

name: Romanelli Le Tese Trebbiano Spoletino
description: Medium-bodied Italian white with texture and subtle fruit. Stone fruit, citrus, and herbal notes with a dry, balanced finish.

name: Domaine des Sables Verts Saumur Blanc Chenin Blanc
description: Clean and focused Chenin Blanc with bright acidity. Apple, pear, and light mineral notes with a dry, refreshing finish.

name: Pieropan Calvarino Garganega
description: Classic Soave with depth and elegance. Almond, citrus, and stone fruit flavors with a long, mineral-driven finish.

name: Marenco Scrapona Moscato d’Asti
description: Lightly sparkling and gently sweet Moscato. Fresh peach, orange blossom, and grape notes with low alcohol and a soft finish.

name: Meyer Fonné Pfœller Riesling
description: Dry Alsace Riesling with structure and clarity. Citrus, stone fruit, and mineral notes with a firm, focused finish.

name: Rolly Gassmann Pflanzerreben de Rorschwihr Riesling
description: Mature Riesling with depth and complexity. Layers of citrus, honeyed notes, and minerality supported by balanced acidity.

name: Marry Edwards Sauvignon Blanc
description: Rich and expressive Sauvignon Blanc with bright acidity. Citrus, tropical fruit, and subtle herbal notes with a polished finish.

name: DeLille Chaleur Blanc Sauvignon Blanc & Semillon
description: Bordeaux-inspired white blend with texture and balance. Citrus, stone fruit, and light oak influence give this wine depth and structure.

name: Upchurch Southwest Facing Sauvignon Blanc
description: Focused and structured Sauvignon Blanc. Bright citrus and stone fruit flavors with a clean, dry finish.

name: Gramercy Cellars Picpoul
description: Crisp and refreshing with bright acidity. Lemon, green apple, and mineral notes make this a lively, easy-drinking white.

name: Archery Summit Vireton Pinot Gris
description: Light and clean Pinot Gris with subtle fruit. Pear, citrus, and a soft texture with a fresh, dry finish.

name: L’Ecole No. 41 Old Vines Chenin Blanc
description: Old-vine Chenin Blanc with bright acidity and clean fruit. Apple, pear, and citrus notes with a crisp, refreshing finish.

name: Lismore Estate Reserve Viognier
description: Textured and aromatic Viognier with stone fruit and floral notes. Rich on the palate but balanced by fresh acidity.

name: Tablas Creek Patelin de Tablas Blanc
description: French-inspired Rhône white blend with balance and freshness. Citrus, stone fruit, and light herbal notes with a dry, clean finish.

name: Dusted Valley Olsen Vineyard Chardonnay
description: Medium-bodied Chardonnay with ripe apple and citrus flavors. Light oak influence and a smooth, balanced finish.

name: Evening Land Seven Springs Chardonnay
description: Elegant Oregon Chardonnay with bright acidity. Citrus, pear, and subtle mineral notes with a clean, focused finish.

name: Evening Land Summum Chardonnay
description: Rich and layered Chardonnay with depth and structure. Stone fruit, citrus, and well-integrated oak with a long finish.

name: Evening Land La Source Chardonnay
description: Complex and expressive Chardonnay with weight and intensity. Ripe fruit, minerality, and subtle oak create a long, polished finish.

name: Sandhi Rinconada Chardonnay
description: Focused and mineral-driven Chardonnay. Citrus, apple, and light oak notes with bright acidity and tension.

name: La Jota W.S. Keyes Vineyard Chardonnay
description: Structured and powerful Chardonnay with depth. Stone fruit, citrus, and oak spice balanced by mountain-grown acidity.

name: Suzor The Sunflower Chardonnay
description: Fresh and approachable Chardonnay with light fruit and subtle texture. Clean and easy-drinking.

name: Grgich Hills Chardonnay
description: Classic Napa Chardonnay with balance and restraint. Apple, citrus, and gentle oak with a smooth finish.

name: Failla Sonoma Coast Chardonnay
description: Cool-climate Chardonnay with bright acidity. Citrus, pear, and light mineral notes keep this fresh and focused.

name: Kistler Les Noisetiers Chardonnay
description: Rich yet balanced Chardonnay with polished texture. Ripe fruit, baking spice, and integrated oak.

name: Pahlmeyer Jayson Chardonnay
description: Fuller-bodied Chardonnay with ripe fruit and smooth oak. Stone fruit, citrus, and a round, lingering finish.

name: LTL Grenache Rosé
description: Dry rosé with fresh red fruit and crisp acidity. Strawberry, citrus, and a clean finish make this refreshing and versatile.

name: Tiberio Cerasuolo d’Abruzzo Montepulciano
description: Deeper-colored rosé with bright fruit and structure. Cherry, strawberry, and fresh acidity with a dry finish.

name: Domaine Mondange Laudria Rosé Sciaccarellu
description: Light and aromatic rosé with delicate red fruit. Fresh, dry, and easy to drink.

name: La Spinetta Il Rosé di Casanova
description: Clean and dry rosé with bright acidity. Red berry and citrus notes with a crisp finish.

name: Fattoria di Bacchereto Terre a Mano Sassocarlo Bianco
description: Textured skin-contact white with depth and character. Stone fruit, citrus peel, and earthy notes with a structured, dry finish.

name: Stephane Aviron Fleurie Vieilles Vignes Gamay
description: Light and elegant Gamay from old vines. Fresh red fruit, floral notes, and soft tannins with a smooth, easy finish.

name: Domaine Fagolett Morgon Le Janin Gamay
description: More structured Beaujolais with darker fruit and a touch of earth. Cherry, plum, and gentle spice with good depth.

name: Enzo Boglietti Barbera d’Alba
description: Bright and food-friendly Barbera with lively acidity. Red cherry, plum, and a clean, dry finish.

name: Roberto Voerzio Il Cerreto Barbera d’Alba
description: Polished and concentrated Barbera with depth. Ripe red fruit, balanced acidity, and a smooth, lingering finish.

name: Voerzio Alberto Barbera d’Alba
description: Rich and expressive Barbera with dark fruit and structure. Balanced acidity keeps it fresh and focused.

name: Masi Serego Alighieri Vaio Armaron
description: Deep and complex red with dried fruit and spice. Rich texture with layers of dark cherry, cocoa, and a long finish.

name: Masi Campolongo di Torbe Amarone della Valpolicella
description: Full-bodied Amarone with power and concentration. Dried fruit, dark chocolate, and warming spice with a long, bold finish.

name: Comando G La Bruja Avería Garnacha
description: Lively Garnacha with bright red fruit and freshness. Juicy, energetic, and lighter on its feet.

name: Coster dels Olivers Garnacha Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Rustic and expressive blend with dark fruit and earth. Firm structure balanced by ripe fruit.

name: Glantenet Pere & Fils Hautes-Côtes de Nuits Pinot Noir
description: Fresh and approachable Pinot Noir with red berry fruit and soft tannins. Light-bodied and easy to enjoy.

name: Rolly Gassmann Pinot Noir
description: Light and savory Pinot Noir with subtle earth and red fruit. Clean and balanced with a gentle finish.

name: Capitain-Gagnerot Savigny-lès-Beaune 1er Cru Les Charnières
description: Structured Pinot Noir with depth and elegance. Red fruit, earth, and fine tannins with a long finish.

name: Domaine Glantenet Hautes-Côtes de Nuits Pinot Noir
description: Classic cool-climate Pinot Noir. Bright cherry, light spice, and fresh acidity.

name: Domaine du Prieuré Savigny-lès-Beaune 1er Cru Les Hauts Jarrons
description: Refined and balanced Pinot Noir. Red fruit, subtle earth, and smooth tannins.

name: Alain Gras Auxey-Duresses Très Vieilles Vignes Pinot Noir
description: Old-vine Pinot Noir with depth and maturity. Layered red fruit, earth, and a silky texture.

name: La Pousse d’Or Clos de Tavannes Santenay 1er Cru
description: Focused and elegant Premier Cru Pinot Noir. Concentrated fruit, minerality, and a long, refined finish.

name: Domaine de Courcel Pommard Le Grand Clos Epenots 1er Cru
description: Powerful and structured Pinot Noir. Dark fruit, firm tannins, and depth built for aging.

name: Domaine de Courcel Pommard Le Grand Clos Epenots 1er Cru
description: Younger and tightly structured expression of this Premier Cru. Dense fruit, strength, and long-term potential.

name: Elio Sandri Langhe Nebbiolo
description: Classic Nebbiolo with bright acidity and firm structure. Red cherry, rose petal, and light earth with a clean, focused finish.

name: Sori Montaribaldi Barbaresco Nebbiolo
description: Refined and balanced Barbaresco with red fruit and floral notes. Structured but approachable with smooth tannins.

name: Marchesi di Grésy Martinenga Barbaresco Nebbiolo
description: Classic Barbaresco with elegance and depth. Cherry, dried rose, and subtle spice with a long finish.

name: Massolino Serralunga d’Alba Barbaresco Nebbiolo
description: Structured Nebbiolo with firm tannins and bright acidity. Red fruit, earth, and minerality with good aging potential.

name: Elena Giuseppe Ascheri Barolo Nebbiolo
description: Classic Barolo with structure and grip. Cherry, dried herbs, and earth supported by firm tannins.

name: Enzo Boglietti Arione Barolo Nebbiolo
description: Powerful and focused Barolo from a respected site. Dark cherry, spice, and strong structure with a long finish.

name: Renato Ratti Marcenasco Barolo Nebbiolo
description: Polished and approachable Barolo. Red fruit, floral notes, and balanced tannins.

name: Roberto Voerzio Fossati Case Nere Barolo Riserva Nebbiolo
description: Highly concentrated and mature Barolo Riserva. Deep layers of fruit, earth, and spice with serious structure.

name: Roberto Voerzio Cerequio Barolo Nebbiolo
description: Intense and refined Barolo from a top vineyard. Dense fruit, firm tannins, and long aging potential.

name: Roberto Voerzio La Serra Barolo Nebbiolo
description: Structured and expressive Barolo with depth. Red fruit, earth, and a powerful backbone.

name: Roberto Voerzio Brunate Barolo Nebbiolo
description: Classic Brunate Barolo with intensity and balance. Concentrated fruit, spice, and strong tannins.

name: Roberto Voerzio Fossati Barolo Nebbiolo
description: Deep and structured Barolo built for aging. Dark fruit, earth, and firm tannins with a long finish.

name: Paul de Albas Tempranillo
description: Structured and mature Tempranillo with dark fruit and savory notes. Firm tannins and depth from extended aging.

name: Marqués de Riscal Reserva Tempranillo
description: Classic Rioja Reserva style. Red fruit, vanilla, and soft spice with a smooth, balanced finish.

name: Izarbe Reserva Selección Tempranillo
description: Medium-bodied Rioja with developed flavors. Cherry, dried herbs, and gentle oak.

name: Izarbe Gran Reserva Tempranillo
description: Aged Gran Reserva with complexity and softness. Leather, dried fruit, and spice with a long finish.

name: Dominio Pingus Flor de Pingus Tempranillo
description: Powerful yet polished Tempranillo. Dark fruit, structure, and intensity with a refined finish.

name: Caparzo La Caduta Rosso di Montalcino
description: Classic Rosso di Montalcino with bright red fruit and firm acidity. Cherry, dried herbs, and a clean, straightforward finish.

name: Badia a Coltibuono Chianti Classico

name: Castello La Leccia Chianti Classico
description: Clean and approachable Chianti Classico. Red cherry, light spice, and a dry, refreshing finish.

name: Castello La Leccia Bruciagna Gran Selezione
description: More structured Chianti Classico with depth and polish. Concentrated fruit, firm tannins, and a long finish.

name: Isola delle Falcole Vecchia Vigna Blend

name: Isola delle Falcole Chianti Classico Gran Selezione
description: Powerful and concentrated Gran Selezione. Dense fruit, firm tannins, and serious structure.

name: Fontodi Chianti Classico
description: Well-balanced Chianti Classico with clarity and depth. Red fruit, earth, and polished tannins.

name: Avignonesi Grifi
description: Blend of Sangiovese and Cabernet Sauvignon with structure and richness. Dark fruit, spice, and a smooth finish.

name: Fattoria di Bacchereto Terre a Mano Sangiovese Blend

name: Baricci Rosso di Montalcino
description: Fresh and focused Rosso di Montalcino. Bright cherry, lively acidity, and clean structure.

name: Baricci Brunello di Montalcino
description: Structured Brunello with depth and balance. Dark cherry, earth, and firm tannins built to age.

name: Argiano Brunello di Montalcino
description: Classic Brunello with elegance and length. Red fruit, dried herbs, and polished tannins.

name: Argiano Brunello di Montalcino
description: Younger, more structured Brunello. Concentrated fruit, firm grip, and long aging potential.

name: Gaja Pieve Santa Restituta Brunello di Montalcino
description: Refined Brunello with depth and precision. Layered fruit, structure, and a long, elegant finish.

name: Caparzo La Casa Brunello di Montalcino

name: Fontodi Flaccianello della Pieve

name: Fontodi Flaccianello della Pieve

name: Château du Beaucastel Châteauneuf-du-Pape

name: Domaine du Terme Gigondas Red Rhône Blend

name: Caiarossa Toscana Rosso

name: Château de Pez Saint-Estèphe

name: Château Soussans Margaux
